attributes.action: Persuade the electricity companies to put everyone over 60 or on benefits onto Economy 7 electricity tariff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Economy 7 gives you half price electricity between 2230 and 0730 by having 2 meters which are radio controlled. This would allow the less well off to reduce their bills by cooking, showering etc at the cheap rate.
